AUTHOR: The Tasty Jaffa
INSTALL_MSG: Allows for people to be asgined permission (roles or individual users) to use the command `[p]speak`, Use `[p]setsay` for info.
NAME: say
SHORT: Bot repeats what it is given
DESCRIPTION: This cog - say will make the bot repeat whatever it was given with settings to allow particular users or roles permission for individual servers.
